subject: Baseball
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: The “original” Frank Thomas, who was in the Mets’ 1962 opening-day lineup, visited Cooperstown for the first time on the weekend that the younger slugger Frank Thomas, known as the Big Hurt, was being inducted.
snippet: The “original” Frank Thomas, who was in the Mets’ 1962 opening-day lineup, visited Cooperstown for the first time on the weekend that the younger slugger Frank Thomas, known as the Big Hurt, was being inducted.
